verses.english: When the sky has split [open]
verses.hausa: Idan sama ta kẽce,

verses.english: And has responded to its Lord and was obligated [to do so]
verses.hausa: Ta saurari Ubangijinta, kuma aka wajabta mata yin saurãron,

verses.english: And when the earth has been extended
verses.hausa: Kuma idan ƙasã aka mĩƙe ta,

verses.english: And has cast out that within it and relinquished [it]
verses.hausa: Kuma ta jẽfar da abin da yake a cikinta, tã wõfinta daga kõme.

verses.english: And has responded to its Lord and was obligated [to do so] -
verses.hausa: Kuma ta saurãri Ubangijinta, aka wajabta mata yin saurãren,

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدْحًا فَمُلَـٰقِيهِ
verses.english: O mankind, indeed you are laboring toward your Lord with [great] exertion and will meet it.
verses.hausa: Ya kai mutum! Lalle ne kai mai aikin wahal da kai ne zuwa ga Ubangijinka, wahala mai tsanani, To, kai mai haɗuwa da Shi ne.

verses.english: Then as for he who is given his record in his right hand,
verses.hausa: To, amma wanda aka bai wa littãfinsa da damansa.

verses.english: He will be judged with an easy account
verses.hausa: To, za a yi masa hisãbi, hisãbi mai sauƙi.

verses.english: And return to his people in happiness.
verses.hausa: Kuma ya jũya zuwa ga iyãlinsa (a cikin Aljanna), yanã mai raha.

verses.arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَـٰبَهُۥ وَرَآءَ ظَهْرِهِۦ
verses.english: But as for he who is given his record behind his back,
verses.hausa: Kuma amma wanda aka bai wa littãfinsa, daga wajen bãyansa.

verses.english: He will cry out for destruction
verses.hausa: To, zã shi dinga kiran halaka!

verses.english: And [enter to] burn in a Blaze.
verses.hausa: Kuma ya shiga sa'ĩr.

verses.english: Indeed, he had [once] been among his people in happiness;
verses.hausa: Lal1e ne shi, yã kasance (a dũniya) cikin iyãlinsa yanã mai raha.

verses.english: Indeed, he had thought he would never return [to Allah].
verses.hausa: Lalle ne yã yi zaton bã zai kõmo ba.

verses.arabic: بَلَىٰٓ إِنَّ رَبَّهُۥ كَانَ بِهِۦ بَصِيرًا
verses.english: But yes! Indeed, his Lord was ever of him, Seeing.
verses.hausa: Na'am! Lalle ne, Ubangijinsa Ya kasance Mai gani gare shi.

verses.english: So I swear by the twilight glow
verses.hausa: To, ba sai Nã rantse da shafaƙi ba.

verses.english: And [by] the night and what it envelops
verses.hausa: Da dare, da abin da ya ƙunsa.

verses.english: And [by] the moon when it becomes full
verses.hausa: Da watã idan (haskensa) ya cika.

verses.english: [That] you will surely experience state after state.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne kunã hawan wani hãli daga wani hãli.

verses.english: So what is [the matter] with them [that] they do not believe,
verses.hausa: To, mẽ ya sãme su, ba su yin ĩmãni?

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْقُرْءَانُ لَا يَسْجُدُونَ ۩
verses.english: And when the Qur'an is recited to them, they do not prostrate [to Allah]?
verses.hausa: Kuma idan an karanta Alkur'ãni a kansu, bã su yin tawãli'u?

verses.english: But those who have disbelieved deny,
verses.hausa: Ba haka ba! waɗanda suka kãfirta, sai ƙaryatãwa suke yi.

verses.english: And Allah is most knowing of what they keep within themselves.
verses.hausa: Alhãli Allah Shĩ ne Mafi sani ga abin a suke tãrãwa.

verses.english: So give them tidings of a painful punishment,
verses.hausa: Saboda haka, ka yi musu bushãra da azãba mai raɗaɗi.

verses.arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍۭ
verses.english: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds. For them is a reward uninterrupted.
verses.hausa: Fãce waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni, suka aikata ayyukan ƙwarai, sunã da wani sakamako wanda bã ya yankẽwa.
